item.title: Dr Andrew Norton - Obituary
item.description: Dr Andrew Norton, Past President and an early member of SCATA, was diagnosed with a malignancy some months ago.

item.title: Dr Alastair Lack - Obituary
item.description: Obituary - Dr Alastair Lack We learned in late March 2022 that Dr Alastair Lack, founding member of SCATA, had died aged 79.
